page.title: 17THE FISH LADY
page.content: On Sunday I went with Nicola to the {fish lady's }house,we asked some questions.I asked her the price of her cheapest and most exspensive fish.She told me that coley was the cheapest (Â£1 per pound),and Dover sole was the most exspensive(Â£6 per pound).I asked the fish lady "is this your van?,or do you work for someone else?".She told me that she worked for herself ,but the van was rented, this is called a franchise.I also asked her how many miles per week she{travelled,}her answer was about 400 miles per week!.I asked what else she sold apart from fish.She told us that she also sold sausages,eggs,cheese and cream. The fish lady works a five day week.Each day She is on the road from 08.00 to 19.00 each day.At present she said that{trade was fairly steady.
